intro.description:
These steps tell you how to execute the test.
Because this test will run locally, do not move the mouse during the test.

item.title: Start the Test Suite
item.description: Start the Test Suite using the button in the running AUT's view or in the Test Suite Browser.

subitem.label: In the dialog, choose to switch to the execution perspective. When the test starts, do not move the mouse. Wait until the test has finished until carrying on.

item.title: Analyse the results
item.description: Look in the results view for information on the test execution.

subitem.label:
In the Reporting Perspective, you can see a table of all of the test runs you have done.
Double click on a test run to open it again in the Test Result View.
You can export a report for the test run from the Test Result Summary View.
